name: getgamelevel
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool music_trivia.
Tool description: A Music Trivia API driven by listeners of ZPlayer, a media player on Android
API description: get a game level with a level parameter. The level this does not imply difficulty

level.description: The level to fetch. Defaults to None.

output.description: The output format type, either 'xml' or 'json'. Defaults to None.
